name: Blue Ninja: Origin
description:
Blue Ninja and his girlfriend were very happy. Until she was kidnapped by an evil Red Ninja. Are you brave enough to face him and save your girlfriend?

Features:
-10 Minimalistic and difficult levels
-"Best time"
-4 Extra challenges
-2 1 Boss battle
-Secrets No secrets

Controls:
A and D - move left and right
SPACE - jump
MOUSE - sword attack (if obtained)
ESC - menu
